CustomField.description: Total Qty of Line Items on an Opportunity.
CustomField.formula: Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_Carbon__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_CNC__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_DieCasting__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_DirectSourced__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_DMLS__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_Extrusion__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_FDM__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_HPMultJetFusion__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_InjectionMolding__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_InjectionMoldingTool__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_PolyJet3D__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_SheetMetal__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_SLA__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_SLS__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_Stamping__c + Opportunity__r.Total_Qty_UrethaneCasting__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum up all quoted line items count from the Opportunity.
CustomField.label: Total Line Items
